string.text: A violent storm strikes your vessel, waves towering over the masts. Your prisoners are secured below deck, but panic is spreading. Your crew awaits your commands as the ship struggles against the tempest's fury.
Direct your crew with calm authority.
Force prisoners to help bail water.
Sacrifice prisoners to lighten the load.

Discord festers aboard your ship. Crew members are divided on your treatment of prisoners. Whispers of mutiny reach your ears through your boatswain, who warns that decisive action is needed before the situation explodes.
Command respect through strength and fairness.
Reach a compromise by freeing some prisoners.
